mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE , MEMB_ID , FILE_DT FROM PROJECT_FILE ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC

SELECT f.file_no , p.prjt_no , b.buss_no , f.file_nm , f.file_path , f.file_type , f.file_desct , f.file_dt , m.memb_nm , f.file_size FROM project_file f, project p, business b, member m WHERE f.memb_id = m.memb_id AND f.buss_no = b.buss_no AND f.prjt_no = p.prjt_no
AND file_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND memb_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
